title: Diversified Communication Services Stocks Technical Snapshot -- BlackBerry, Level 3 Communications, Crown Castle Intl., Oi S.A. and Voltari
text: Diversified Communication Services Stocks Technical Snapshot -- BlackBerry, Level 3 Communications, Crown Castle Intl., Oi S.A. and Voltari   Published on 2015-09-30 10:46:26 Diversified Communication Services Stocks Technical Snapshot -- BlackBerry, Level 3 Communications, Crown... -- NEW YORK, September    > NEW YORK , September   Equity Research Institute has initiated coverage on the following equities: BlackBerry Ltd (NASDAQ: BBRY ), Level 3 Communications Inc. (NYSE: LVLT ), Crown Castle International Corporation (NYSE: CCI ), Oi S.A. (NYSE: OIBR ) and Voltari Corporation (NASDAQ: VLTC ). Free research report on BlackBerry can be accessed at https://www.equityresearchinstitute.com/BBRY.pdf . On Tuesday, September 29, 2015 , the NASDAQ Composite ended at 4,517.32, down 0.59%, the Dow Jones Industrial Average edged 0.30% higher, to finish the day at 16,049.13 and the S&P 500 closed at 1,884.09, up 0.12%. The losses were broad based as five out of nine sectors ended the session in negative. Register for your complimentary reports at the links given below. On Tuesday, shares in BlackBerry Ltd ended the session 4.44% lower at $6.02 . The stock reported a trading volume of 9.45 million shares, above its three months average volume of 7.46 million shares. BlackBerry Ltd's shares have declined 18.32% in the last one month, 26.41% in the previous three months and 45.17% on YTD basis. The company is trading 18.92% below its 50-day moving average and 34.58% below its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of BlackBerry Ltd have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 22.64. Sign up and read the free notes on BBRY at: https://www.equityresearchinstitute.com/BBRY.pdf Level 3 Communications Inc.'s stock edged 0.17% higher, to close the day at $41.64 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 3.12 million shares, above its three months average volume of 2.48 million shares. Over the last one month and over the past three months, Level 3 Communications Inc.'s shares have lost 8.22% and 20.94%, respectively. Furthermore, the stock has declined 15.67% since the start of this year. The company's shares are trading 12.22% below their 50-day moving average. Additionally, Level 3 Communications Inc. traded at a PE ratio of 47.86 and has an RSI of 31.12. The complimentary notes on LVLT can be downloaded in PDF format at: https://www.equityresearchinstitute.com/LVLT.pdf On Tuesday, shares in Crown Castle International Corp. recorded a trading volume of 1.97 million shares, lower than their three months average volume of 2.13 million shares. The stock ended the day 0.05% lower at $77.53 . Shares of the company traded at a PE ratio of 51.69. Crown Castle International Corp.'s stock has lost 6.45% in the last one month and 2.43% in the previous three months. However, the stock has gained 1.52% on YTD basis. The company is trading below its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 3.99% and 4.63%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of Crown Castle International Corp. have an RSI of 43.34. Register for free on Equity Research Institute and access the latest research on CCI at: https://www.equityresearchinstitute.com/CCI.pdf Oi S.A.'s stock lost 1.13%, to close Tuesday's session at $0.67 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 1.30 million shares, below its three months average volume of 1.94 million shares. Over the last one month and the previous three months, Oi S.A.'s shares have declined 10.36% and 64.80%, respectively. Additionally, the stock has plummeted 76.41% since the start of this year. The company is trading 30.65% and 61.96% below its 50-day and 200-day moving averages, respectively. Furthermore, Oi S.A.'s stock has an RSI of 34.67. The complete research on OIBR is available for free at: https://www.equityresearchinstitute.com/OIBR.pdf Voltari Corp.'s stock finished Tuesday's session 2.87% lower at $6.77 . A total of 0.28 million shares were traded, which was below its three months average volume of 1.75 million shares. Over the previous three months and since the beginning of this year, Voltari Corp.'s shares have rallied 19.82% and 925.76%, respectively. However, the stock has fallen by 4.78% in the last one month. The company's shares are trading above their 200-day moving average by 34.49%. Voltari Corp.'s stock has an RSI of 39.47. Free in-depth research on VLTC is available at: https://www.equityresearchinstitute.com/VLTC.pdf About Equity Research Institute: Equity Research Institute ("ERI") produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. ERI has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps.
